meanings.definition: A person who sells goods in a store.
meanings.sent1: The salesclerks greeted customers with a smile.
meanings.sent2: I asked one of the salesclerks for help finding a specific item.
meanings.sent3: The salesclerks decided to have a dance-off to entertain the customers.
meanings.sent4: The salesclerks were like busy bees buzzing around the store.
meanings.sent5: The salesclerks' knowledge of the products impressed me.

meanings.definition: The salesclerks were busy helping customers during the holiday rush.
meanings.sent1: During the holiday rush, the salesclerks worked tirelessly to assist every customer.
meanings.sent2: The salesclerks efficiently managed the long lines at the checkout counters.
meanings.sent3: The salesclerks organized a secret Santa gift exchange behind the counter.
meanings.sent4: The salesclerks were the unsung heroes of the busy shopping season.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of the salesclerks shone through their hard work.
